quote: If you do not push the boundaries, you will never know where they are. – T.S. Eliot
fact: A literal translation of a standard traffic sign in China: "Give large space to the festive dog that makes sport in the roadway."
joke: I saw my husband trip and fall while carrying a laundry basket full of ironed clothes. I watched it all unfold.
